metadata.title: USN-4052-1 -- Whoopsie vulnerability
metadata.description: Kevin Backhouse discovered Whoopsie incorrectly handled very large crash reports. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4052-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  whoopsie - 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1 libwhoopsie0 - 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1 libwhoopsie-dev - 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
